sqlQuery.name: SequencePieces
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT vs.source_id as source_id, vs.project_id, sp.distance_from_left + 1 as start_min, sp.end_position - sp.start_position + sp.distance_from_left + 1 as end_max, case when es.source_id is null then CONCAT('(N)-', es.length) else es.source_id end as piece_source_id, sp.start_position as piece_min, sp.end_position as piece_max, sp.strand_orientation as piece_strand, sp.sequence_order, sp.edge_level, eso.name as piece_so, vso.name as so FROM webready.SequencePieceClosure_p sp, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p vs, sres.OntologyTerm vso, Dots.NASEQUENCE es, sres.OntologyTerm eso WHERE vs.na_sequence_id = sp.virtual_na_sequence_id AND es.na_sequence_id = sp.piece_na_sequence_id AND es.sequence_ontology_id = eso.ontology_term_id AND vs.sequence_ontology_id = vso.ontology_term_id AND vs.source_id is not null AND es.source_id is not null and vs.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) and sp.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) ORDER BY sp.edge_level, sp.sequence_order

SELECT s.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id , p.start_min, p.end_max , p.piece_id AS piece_source_id , p.piece_start AS piece_min, p.piece_end AS piece_max , CASE p.is_reversed WHEN 0 THEN '+' WHEN 1 THEN '-' END AS piece_strand , p.part_number AS sequence_order , s.sequence_type AS so FROM apidb.agpPiece p, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p s WHERE s.source_id = p.source_id AND gap_type is null and s.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Taxonomy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id , sa.project_id , taxonomy.name , taxonomy.ncbi_tax_id , taxonomy.rank FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa , ( WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT tax.taxon_id, tax.parent_id, tax.rank, tax.name, tax.ncbi_tax_id, tax.name organism, 1 orderNum FROM webready.taxontree tax WHERE name IN (SELECT DISTINCT organism FROM webready.GeneAttributes_p where org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)) UNION SELECT sub.taxon_id, sub.parent_id, sub.rank, sub.name, sub.ncbi_tax_id, cte.organism, cte.orderNum + 1 FROM cte, webready.taxontree sub WHERE cte.parent_id = sub.taxon_id AND sub.name != 'root' ) SELECT taxon_id, parent_id, rank, name, ncbi_tax_id, organism, row_number() OVER () ordernum FROM ( SELECT * FROM cte ORDER BY organism DESC, orderNum ASC ) t ) taxonomy WHERE sa.organism = taxonomy.organism AND sa.org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) ORDER BY taxonomy.ordernum DESC

sqlQuery.name: Aliases
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT si.sequence as source_id, sa.project_id, si.id as seq_id FROM webready.GenomicSequenceId_p si, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa WHERE lower(si.sequence) != lower(si.id) and si.sequence = sa.source_id

sqlQuery.name: Centromere
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT fl.sequence_source_id as source_id, 'PlasmoDB' AS project_id, fl.start_min, fl.end_max FROM webready.FeatureLocation_p fl, Sres.OntologyTerm so WHERE fl.feature_type = 'Miscellaneous' AND so.ontology_term_id = fl.sequence_ontology_id AND so.name = 'centromere' and fl.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGffDbxrefs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ens.source_id, ens.project_id, CONCAT('taxon:' , t.ncbi_tax_id ) as gff_dbxref FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ens, sres.Taxon t WHERE ens.taxon_id = t.taxon_id and ens.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) UNION SELECT ens.source_id, ens.project_id, CONCAT('GenBank:' , dr.primary_identifier ) as gff_dbxref FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ens, dots.dbrefNaSequence drns, sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE ens.na_sequence_id = drns.na_sequence_id AND drns.db_ref_id = dr.db_ref_id AND dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'GenBank' and ens.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) UNION SELECT ens.source_id, ens.project_id, CONCAT('&&brcName&&:' , ens.source_id ) as gff_dbxref FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ens WHERE ens.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Repeats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bg.sequence_source_id as source_id, sa.project_id, NULL as note, 'repeat_region' as feature_key, bg.start_location as start_min, bg.end_location as end_max, 'rpt_type' as qualifier_key, 'dispersed' as qualifier_value FROM webready.genomebedgraph_p bg, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa WHERE bg.algorithm = 'repeatMasked' AND bg.sequence_source_id = sa.source_id AND sa.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) AND bg.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: TandemRepeats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bg.sequence_source_id as source_id, sa.project_id, 'repeat_region' as feature_key, bg.start_location as start_min, bg.end_location as end_max, 'rpt_type' as qualifier_key, 'tandem' as qualifier_value FROM webready.genomebedgraph_p bg, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa WHERE bg.algorithm = 'tandem_repeat_finder' AND bg.sequence_source_id = sa.source_id AND sa.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) AND bg.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: LowComplexity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bg.sequence_source_id as source_id, sa.project_id, 'misc_feature' as feature_key, bg.start_location as start_min, bg.end_location as end_max, 'low complexity region: DUST' as note FROM webready.genomebedgraph_p bg, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa WHERE bg.algorithm = 'dustmasker' AND bg.sequence_source_id = sa.source_id AND sa.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) AND bg.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)
